document_name: DGTTF Gender Mainstreaming in DGS Malawi LPAC approved.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/MWI/00061391/DGTTF Gender Mainstreaming in DGS Malawi LPAC approved.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Gender sensitive programming and planning in the Democratic Governance Sector Working Group enhanced
Output 2: Legal and statutory interventions to strengthen the national gender machinery identified and put in place
Output 3: Women's participation in decision making processes in all administrative levels enhanced

project_descr:
1 Identify gaps in women's political and legal participation
2 Strengthening capacity of DG Sector institutions to provide effective legislation for the political and legal empowerment of women
project_title: Gender Mainstreaming in the Democratic Governance Sector
